tool_description: Determine in realtime if a given phone number is valid and the type of phone line it is connected to. Works for all countries!
title: Checky - Verify Phone Number

api_list.name: Verify (Batch)
api_list.description: This endpoint accepts a POST request with JSON payload to verify the validity of a phone number and returns its type and national format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://checky-verify-phone-number.p.rapidapi.com/verify/batch"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "checky-verify-phone-number.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Verify (POST)
api_list.description: This endpoint accepts a POST request with JSON payload to verify the validity of a phone number and returns its type and national format.
api_list.code:

    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "checky-verify-phone-number.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Verify
api_list.description: To use this endpoint, you need to make an HTTP GET request to the API with the phone and country parameters in the query string.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The two-letter country code of the phone number.  eg **US**, **CA**, **FR** etc.

required_parameters.name: phone
required_parameters.description: The phone number to verify. It should be provided without any spaces or special characters.

api_list.name: Carrier (Batch)
api_list.description: The Checky Carrier Information endpoint allows you to retrieve information about the carrier or service provider for a given phone number.

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Carrier
api_list.description: The Checky Carrier Information endpoint allows you to retrieve information about the carrier or service provider for a given phone number.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The country code of the phone number.

required_parameters.name: phone
required_parameters.description: The phone number for which to retrieve carrier information.

api_list.name: Verify (Batch)
api_list.description: This endpoint accepts a POST request with JSON payload to verify the validity of a phone number and returns its type and national format.
